Settings.ChatMessagePermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to see chat messages when effects are applied, removed, or expire. Setting this to None will never show chat messages.
Settings.AppControlsPermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to see and apply Convenient Effects through the application via the button on token controls. Setting this to None will disable the button entirely.
Settings.RemoveControlsPermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to remove Convenient Effects through the button on the token controls. Setting this to None will disable the button entirely.
Settings.AllowPlayerCustomEffectsHint: If enabled, players will be allowed to create, duplicate, edit, and delete all custom effects.
Settings.IntegratewithATEHint: If enabled, certain effects will also change light emitted from tokens or the size of a token via Active Token Effects.',
Settings.IntegratewithTokenMagicHint: If enabled, certain effects will also apply a token magic filter to tokens via Token Magic.
Settings.PrioritizeTargetsHint: If enabled, effects will be applied to any targeted tokens instead of selected tokens.
Settings.ShowNestedEffectsHint: If enabled, nested effects will be shown in the application.
Settings.ModifyStatusEffectsHint: This is how status effects on the token HUD will be modified. Replacing them means all other status effects will be removed in favor of the conditions provided by Convenient Effects. Adding them means they are appended to the end of the existing status effects. Requires a Foundry reload on change.
Settings.ShowChatMessageEffectDescriptio: This is when effect descriptions are shown on chat messages.
Settings.StatusEffectsSortOrderHint: This is how status effects are sorted in the token HUD. Requires a Foundry reload on change.
Effects.BlindedDescription:
- A blinded creature can't see and automatically fails any ability check that requires sight.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage.
Effects.CharmedDescription:
- A charmed creature can't attack the charmer or target the charmer with harmful abilities or magical effects.
- The charmer has advantage on any ability check to interact socially with the creature.
Effects.ConcentratingDescription: Some Spells require you to maintain Concentration in order to keep their magic active. If you lose Concentration, such a spell ends.
Effects.DeafenedDescription: - A deafened creature can't hear and automatically fails any ability check that requires hearing.
Effects.Exhaustion2Description: Disadvantage on ability checks and speed halved
Effects.Exhaustion3Description: Disadvantage on ability checks, speed halved, and disadvantage on attacks and saving throws
Effects.Exhaustion4Description: Disadvantage on ability checks, speed halved, disadvantage on attacks and saving throws, and hit point maximum halved
Effects.Exhaustion5Description: Disadvantage on ability checks, speed reduced to 0, disadvantage on attacks and saving throws, and hit point maximum halved
Effects.FrightenedDescription:
- A frightened creature has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls while the source of its fear is within line of sight.
- The creature can't willingly move closer to the source of its fear.
Effects.GrappledDescription:
- A grappled creature's speed becomes 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed.
- The condition ends if the grappler is incapacitated.
- The condition also ends if an effect removes the grappled creature from the reach of the grappler or grappling effect.
Effects.IncapacitatedDescription: - An incapacitated creature can't take actions or reactions
Effects.InvisibleDescription:
- An invisible creature is impossible to see without the aid of magic or a special sense. For the purpose of hiding, the creature is heavily obscured. The creature's location can be detected by any noise it makes or any tracks it leaves.
- Attack rolls against the creature have disadvantage, and the creature's attack rolls have advantage.
Effects.ParalyzedDescription:
- A paralyzed creature is incapacitated (see the condition) and can't move or speak.
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws. Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
- Any attack that hits the creature is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature.
Effects.PetrifiedDescription:
- A petrified creature is transformed, along with any nonmagical object it is wearing or carrying, into a solid inanimate substance (usually stone). Its weight increases by a factor of ten, and it ceases aging.
- The creature is incapacitated (see the condition), can't move or speak, and is unaware of its surroundings.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
- The creature has resistance to all damage.
- The creature is immune to poison and disease, although a poison or disease already in its system is suspended, not neutralized. Remove all movement, grant advantage to all who attack, and add damage resistance to all magical and physical attacks
Effects.PoisonedDescription: - A poisoned creature has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
Effects.ProneDescription:
- A prone creature's only movement option is to crawl, unless it stands up and thereby ends the condition.
- The creature has disadvantage on attack rolls.
- An attack roll against the creature has advantage if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature. Otherwise, the attack roll has disadvantage.
Effects.RestrainedDescription:
- A restrained creature's speed becomes 0, and it can't benefit from any bonus to its speed.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage, and the creature's attack rolls have disadvantage.
- The creature has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws.
Effects.StunnedDescription:
- A stunned creature is incapacitated (see the condition), can't move, and can speak only falteringly.
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
Effects.UnconsciousDescription:
- An unconscious creature is incapacitated (See the condition) can't move or speak, and is unaware of its surroundings.
- The creature drops whatever its holding and falls prone (See the condition).
- The creature automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws.
- Attack rolls against the creature have advantage.
- Any attack that hits the creature is a critical hit if the attacker is within 5 feet of the creature.
Effects.AcidArrowDescription: Causes 2d4 acid damage at the end of next turn
Effects.AidDescription: Add to current and maximum hit points for 8 hours
Effects.AlterSelfDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
Effects.AntilifeShellDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
Effects.ArcaneHandDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
Effects.BaneDescription: Subtract 1d4 from all saving throws and attack rolls for 1 minute
Effects.BeaconofHopeDescription: Adds advantage to wisdom saving throws and death saving throws for 1 minute
Effects.BlackTentaclesDescription: Apply the effects of the restrained condition for 1 minute
Effects.BlessDescription: Add 1d4 to all saving throws and attack rolls for 1 minute
Effects.BlindnessDescription: Disadvantage on attack rolls while granting advantage to all who attack for 1 minute
Effects.DeafnessDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute
Effects.BlurDescription: Grants disadvantage to all who attack for 1 minute
Effects.CharmPersonDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
Effects.CommandDescription: No active effects and lasts until the end of next turn
Effects.ContagionDescription: Choose between blinding sickness, filth fever, flesh rot, mindfire, seizure, or slimy doom
Effects.BlindingSicknessDescription: Disadvantage on wisdom checks and wisdom saving throws for 7 days
Effects.FilthFeverDescription: Disadvantage on strength checks strength saving throws, and attacks that use strength for 7 days
Effects.FleshRotDescription: Disadvantage on charisma checks and vulnerability to all damage
Effects.MindfireDescription: Disadvantage on intelligence checks and intelligence saving throws for 7 days
Effects.SeizureDescription: Disadvantage on dexterity checks, dexterity saving throws, and attacks that use dexterity for 7 days
Effects.SlimyDoomDescription: Disadvantage on constitution checks and constitution saving throws for 7 days
Effects.DarkvisionDescription: Upgrade darkvision to 60 ft. for 8 hours
Effects.DisguiseSelfDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
Effects.DivineFavorDescription: Add 1d4 radiant damage to weapon attacks for 1 minute
Effects.DivineWordDescription: Adds various effects based on the remaining hit points
Effects.EnhanceAbilityDescription: Choose between Bear's Endurance, Bull's Strength, Cat's Grace, Eagle's Splendor, Fox's Cunning, or Owl's Wisdom
Effects.BearsEnduranceDescription: Advantage on constitution checks and 2d6 temp hit points for 1 hour
Effects.BullsStrengthDescription: Advantage on strength checks and double maximum carrying capacity for 1 hour
Effects.CatsGraceDescription: Advantage on dexterity checks for 1 hour
Effects.EaglesSplendorDescription: Advantage on charisma checks for 1 hour
Effects.FoxsCunningDescription: Advantage on intelligence checks for 1 hour
Effects.OwlsWisdomDescription: Advantage on wisdom checks for 1 hour
Effects.EnlargeDescription: Add 1d4 to damage and advantage on strength checks and strength saving throws for 1 minute
Effects.ReduceDescription: Subtract 1d4 from damage and disadvantage on strength checks and strength saving throws for 1 minute
Effects.FaerieFireDescription: Grants advantage to all who attack for 1 minute
Effects.FeatherFallDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute
Effects.FeeblemindDescription: Set intelligence and charisma scores to 1 until removed
Effects.FireShieldDescription: Choose between cold or fire resistance
Effects.FireShieldColdResistanceDescript: Add damage resistance to cold for 10 minutes
Effects.FireShieldFireResistanceDescript: Add damage resistance to fire for 10 minutes
Effects.FindthePathDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 day
Effects.FlyDescription: Upgrade flying speed to 60 ft. for 10 minutes
Effects.ForesightDescription: Grants advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws while granting disadvantage to all who attack for 8 hours
Effects.FreedomofMovementDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
Effects.GlobeofInvulnerabilityDescriptio: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute
Effects.GreaterInvisibilityDescription: Grants advantage on attack rolls while forcing disadvantage to all who attack for 1 minute
Effects.GuidanceDescription: Adds 1d4 to one ability or skill check for 1 minute
Effects.GuidingBoltDescription: Grants advantage to next attacker or until the end of next turn
Effects.HasteDescription: Double speed, add 2 to AC, and advantage on dexterity saving throws for 1 minute
Effects.HeroesFeastDescription: Immunity to poison and frightened, make all wisdom saving throws with advantage, and hit point maximum increases by 2d10 for 24 hours
Effects.HideousLaughterDescription: Apply the effects of the prone and incapacitated conditions for 1 minute
Effects.HoldMonsterDescription: Apply the effects of the paralyzed condition for 1 minute
Effects.HoldPersonDescription: Apply the effects of the paralyzed condition for 1 minute
Effects.HolyAuraDescription: Advantage on saving throws, grant disadvantage to all who attack, and emit dim light in 5 radius (requires ATL) for 1 minute
Effects.HuntersMarkDescription: No active effects and lasts until removed (for now)
Effects.InvisibilityDescription: Grants advantage on next attack roll while forcing disadvantage to all who attack for 1 hour. Expires after 1 attack.
Effects.IrresistibleDanceDescription: Zero movement, disadvantage on dexterity saving throws, disadvantage on attack rolls, and grants advantage to all who attack for 1 minute
Effects.JumpDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute
Effects.LongstriderDescription: Increase all movement by 10 ft. for 1 hour
Effects.MageArmorDescription: Upgrades armor to 13 + dex modifier for 8 hours
Effects.MindBlankDescription: Adds immunity to psychic damage for 24 hours
Effects.MirrorImageDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute
Effects.PasswithoutTraceDescription: Add 10 to stealth checks for 1 hour
Effects.ProtectionfromEnergyDescription: Choose between acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder resistance
Effects.ProtectionfromAcidDescription: Adds damage resistance to acid for 1 hour
Effects.ProtectionfromColdDescription: Adds damage resistance to cold for 1 hour
Effects.ProtectionfromFireDescription: Adds damage resistance to fire for 1 hour
Effects.ProtectionfromLightningDescripti: Adds damage resistance to lightning for 1 hour
Effects.ProtectionfromThunderDescription: Adds damage resistance to thunder for 1 hour
Effects.ProtectionfromPoisonDescription: Adds resistance to poison for 1 hour (does not grant automatic advantage on saving throws against poison
Effects.ProtectionfromEvilandGoodDescrip: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes
Effects.RegenerateDescription: Regain 1 hit point at the start of each turn for 1 hour
Effects.ResilientSphereDescription: Adds total immunity to all damage and half movement
Effects.ResistanceDescription: Add 1d4 to a single saving throw in the next minute
Effects.ShieldDescription: Add 5 to AC until next turn
Effects.ShieldofFaithDescription: Adds 2 to the AC for 10 minutes
Effects.SlowDescription: Halves movement and subtract 2 from AC and dexterity saving throws for 1 minute
Effects.SpeakwithAnimalsDescription: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes
Effects.SpeakwithDeadDescription: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes
Effects.SpeakwithPlantsDescription: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes
Effects.SpiderClimbDescription: Grants climbing speed equal to walking speed for 1 hour
Effects.SpiritGuardiansDescription: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes
Effects.SpiritualWeaponDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute
Effects.StoneskinDescription: Adds resistance to non-magical physical damage for 1 hour
Effects.SuggestionDescription: No active effects and lasts for 8 hours
Effects.TelekinesisDescription: No active effects and lasts for 10 minutes
Effects.TrueStrikeDescription: Grants advantage on next attack or until the end of next turn
Effects.ViciousMockeryDescription: Grants disadvantage on next attack or until the end of next turn
Effects.WardingBondDescription: Adds 1 to AC and saving throws and grants resistance to all damage for 1 hour
Effects.WaterBreathingDescription: No active effects and lasts for 24 hours
Effects.WaterWalkDescription: No active effects and lasts for 1 hour
Effects.BardicInspirationDescription: Add a dice to a single ability check, attack roll, or saving throw in the next 10 minutes
Effects.BardicInspirationD6Description: For bards from level 1 to level 4
Effects.BardicInspirationD8Description: For bards from level 5 to level 9
Effects.BardicInspirationD10Description: For bards from level 10 to level 14
Effects.BardicInspirationD12Description: For bards from level 15 to level 20
Effects.ChannelDivinitySacredWeaponDescr: Add charisma modifier (minimum +1) to all weapon attack rolls and emits 20/40 light for 1 minute (requires ATL)
Effects.ChannelDivinityTurntheUnholyDesc: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute. Expires on taking damage.
Effects.ChannelDivinityTurnUndeadDescrip: No active effects and lasts for 1 minute. Expires on taking damage.
Effects.KiEmptyBodyDescription: Grants advantage on attack rolls, forces disadvantage to all who attack, and grants resistance to all damage except force for 1 minute
Effects.PatientDefenseDescription: Grants disadvantage to all who attack and advantage on all dexterity saving throws until next turn
Effects.RageDescription: Advantage on strength checks and strength saving throws, a variable bonus to melee damage based on barbarian level, and resistance to piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage for 1 minute. Also handles Path of the Totem Warrior resistances.
Effects.RecklessAttackDescription: Advantage on melee attacks for a turn and grants advantage to those who attack for 1 round
Effects.RecklessAttackAdvantageToAttacke: Reckless Attack (grant advantage to those who attack)
Effects.BullseyeLanternDescription: Adds lantern light in a 60 degree cone for 6 hours (requires ATL)
Effects.CandleDescription: Adds candle light for 1 hour (requires ATL)
Effects.HoodedLanternDescription: Adds hooded lantern light for 6 hours (requires ATL)
Effects.LanternDescription: Adds lantern light for 6 hours (requires ATL)
Effects.TorchDescription: Adds torch light for 1 hour (requires ATL)
Effects.BonusActionDescription: No active effects and expires on turn start
Effects.CoverHalfDescription: Adds 2 to AC and dexterity saving throws
Effects.CoverThreeQuartersDescription: Adds 5 to AC and dexterity saving throws
Effects.DodgeDescription: Grants disadvantage to all who attack and advantage on all dexterity saving throws until next turn
Effects.FlankedDescription: Grants advantage to all who melee attack
Effects.FlankingDescription: Grants advantage on melee attack rolls
Effects.GreatWeaponMasterDescription: Subtracts 5 from melee attacks but adds 10 to melee damage
Effects.HeavilyEncumberedDescription: Lowers movement by 20 ft., disadvantage on all attack rolls, and disadvantage on strength, dexterity, and constitution saves
Effects.InspirationDescription: Advantage on everything and expires after any action, save, check, or skill roll
Effects.ReactionDescription: No active effects and expires on turn start
Effects.ReadyDescription: No active effects and expires on turn start
Effects.SharpshooterDescription: Subtracts 5 from ranged attacks but adds 10 to ranged damage
ConvenientEffectsControllerResetStatusEf:
Are You Sure?

This will reset all configured status effects to the module defaults and reload Foundry.
Interface.PleaseSelect: Please select or target a token to toggle the effect
